TITLE: About Live-Reporter+
MSG_0:
Live-Reporter+ is upgraded for these below functions.

1. Removed iAd banner.

2. Battery loss is improved by blank screen mode.

3. Max client number is from 2 to 8.

4. Web interface is implemented.
MSG_1:
Main View

The iAd is removed from main view.

Administrator web interface address is shown in there.

The max client number is changed from 2 to 8.
MSG_2:
“Blank Screen on Idling” in Video Settings View

At zero client connection,

these video and audio capture are held up by this switch.
MSG_3:
“Administration Web Interface” in Network Settings View

The web interface parameters are updated by this function.

The web interface setting view is shown by the “Open Web Interface Setting”.
MSG_4:
Web Interface Setting

“Port Number” is web interface port number.

The port number dose not conflict RTSP port number.

“User Name” and “Password” are authentication for web interface access.

At the default, “User Name” and “Password” are

“root” and “admin”, respectively.
